name: Anna Hamill
description: Anna Hamill worked as a patrol officer inNight City. Amidst the rife corruption of theNCPD, Anna remained honest and was against any form of injustice. Her intentions were always pure, and she was one of the few good cops in town looking to make a difference. This, however, did not sit well with her less ethical colleagues. She would often become involved in matters the NCPD were already well aware of but simply turned a blind eye to. Despite the hostility from her colleagues, she persisted. While decent and honest, Anna is shown to be quick tempered and impulsive. In 2077, Anna began working...
